name: Prisoned
description:
Prisoned is a short narrative adventure about depression and the struggle of loneliness. You explore the story of Judy and try to find a way out of her depression.

Prisoned is in early alpha stage and this is only a demo. But I hope you still enjoy it. You can download it for free or name your own price!

Development: Jakub Juszczak @apertureless
Music: James Opie http://jamesopiecomposer.com/

Alpha 1.3
I reworked a lot of the story elements in 1.3. It's very different from the previous version.

And here is a fantastic article at indiestatik:
The Suffocating Sensation Of Loneliness In Prisoned
Making of Prisoned
